contentList:
-- Eyeballs: Blindness -- Acid damage Your eyes are destroyed; you gain the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag> condition. Magic such as <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_LesserRestoration">Lesser Restoration</LSTag> can restore your sight. -- Your eyes are destroyed; you gain the blinded condition. Magic such as the regenerate spell can restore your sight.
Partial Blindness -- Acid damage Your eyes are damaged; you have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Perception">Perception</LSTag> checks that rely on sight and on ranged <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>. If you are already suffering from <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="Goon_Real_Injury_Grit_Glory_Partial_Blindness">Partial Blindness</LSTag> and are inflicted with it again, you instead gain the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="Goon_Real_Injury_Grit_Glory_Blindness">Blindness</LSTag> injury. Magic such as <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_LesserRestoration">Lesser Restoration</LSTag> can restore your sight. -- Your eyes are damaged; you have disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight and on ranged attack rolls. Magic such as the regenerate spell can heal the damage to your eyes. If you have already suffered partial blindness, you're blinded.
Ocular Damage -- Cold damage One of your corneas is damaged from frostbite. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Perception">Perception</LSTag> checks that rely on sight and on ranged <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>. If you are already suffering from <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="Goon_Real_Injury_Grit_Glory_Ocular_Damage">Ocular Damage</LSTag> and are inflicted with it again, you instead gain the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="Goon_Real_Injury_Grit_Glory_Blindness">Blindness</LSTag> injury. Magic such as <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_LesserRestoration">Lesser Restoration</LSTag> can restore the damaged cornea. -- One of your corneas is damaged from frostbite. You have disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight and on ranged attack rolls. Magic such as the regenerate spell can restore the damaged cornea. If you have no corneas that remain undamaged after sustaining this injury, you're blinded.
-- Feets: Destroyed Foot -- Acid damage Your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> is halved. If you use the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dash</LSTag> action you fall <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE ">Prone</LSTag> at the end of your turn. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="Acrobatics">Acrobatics</LSTag> checks. Magic such as the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Regenerate">Regenerate</LSTag> spell can restore the damaged appendage. -- Your speed on foot is halved, and you must use a crutch or cane to move. You fall prone after using the Dash action. You have disadvantage on Dexterity checks made to balance. Magic such as the regenerate spell can restore the damaged appendage.
Gangrene of the Foot -- Cold damage
Explosive Grounding of the Foot -- Lightning damage
-- Hands: Destroyed Hand You are <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISARM">Disarmed</LSTag> upon being injured. You have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> while you're dual wielding melee or ranged weapons, wielding a two handed weapon or have a shield equipped. Magic such as the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Regenerate">Regenerate</LSTag> spell can restore the damaged appendage. -- You can no longer hold anything with two hands, and you can hold only a single object at a time. Magic such as the regenerate spell can restore the lost appendage.
Gangrene of the Hand -- Cold damage
Explosive Grounding of the Hand -- Lightning damage
Broken Arm -- Bludgeoning Damage
-- Other: Anosmia -- Cold damage You lose your sense of smell and taste. You're immune to smells and tastes that would make you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STINKING_CLOUD">Nauseous</LSTag>. The condition heals if you succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> after receiving healing. -- You lose your sense of smell and taste. You automatically fail any ability checks that involve your sense of smell or taste. The condition heals if you receive any magical healing.
Systematic Damage -- Cold damage You have disadvantage on <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag>, and <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>. Magic such as the <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Regenerate">Regenerate</LSTag> spell can cure the damage. -- You have disadvantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution ability checks and Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws. Magic such as the regenerate spell cures this damage.
